What is Quartz?

Quartz is a platform for collecting events from various sources which offers a suite of tools to filter and visualize them. Check out the documentation for more information.

Technologies used

Frontend
  • MaterializeCSS
  • jQuery
  • jQuery Datatables
  • d3js and c3js
Backend
  • Python 3.5+
  • MongoDB
